page.title: 01 Overview
page.content: This is a Rural area to the south-west of Chesterfield most of which is devoted to{improved grassland for grazing sheep and cattle. In the north and south-east are areas of {decidious woodland}mixed with smaller {coniferous plantations. The headwaters of the River Hipper and tributaries drain into the River Rother to the east. Numerous wells supply water to the farms and other dwellings in the area. Settlement in the area is mostly {isolated houses, farms and public {houses}although several houses in the village of Holymoorside come just within the northern boundary. The A632 passes through the area providing a main route from Chesterfield to Matlock.{Highest point {Spitewinter (338,666) 318m}above sea level.
